channel.title: Put your CoD progress here
channel.description:
Post your CoD progresses
My CoD progress: MW2: 10th prestige lvl 70 (hacked) Black Ops: 11th prestige lvl 48 (will no-life until 15th prestige lvl 50)(will use no hacks, will get legitly) MW3: Unknown(until november..)(i will get 10th prestige lvl 70 in mw3 legitly with no hacks, or if one of my friends have a unbannable 10th prestige lvl 70 hack ill ask him to hack me to 10th prestige lvl 70 in mw3)
My internet is kinda slow atm so:
I'll later no-life black ops when my internet gets faster for 15th prestige lvl 70 to be maxed on mw2 and black ops and then ill hack 10th prestige lvl 70 in mw3 or get 10th prestige lvl 70 in mw3 legitly no hacks. so i would be maxed in mw2, black ops, mw3 (those are the main 3 call of duty games) so i would be maxed in those 3 Call of Duty games. That is so pro. :D

item.title: Put your CoD progress here
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

[quote=“Mack n cheese, post:23, topic:411921”]mw2: 9th prestige (hacked)

black ops: 4th prestige lvl 20 something

mw3: i dont plan on buying it for a while after it comes out.

prolly gonna be playing skyrim(:[/quote]
i just preordered mw3 because i want it the exact day it gets released
never buy games few time after it comes out
always PREORDER it
because when you buy it and start playing
people have more skill than u do
and will lvl up very slowly
i was pro in black ops till i quit for a bit
and now i lost my skill
and im getting slow xp
thats why im preordering mw3 and nolifing it without quitting for a bit
i learned my lesson with black ops

@soul
nice kd bro

Read full topic
